verses.verse: Therefore <WG3767> be imitators <WG3402> of God, <WG2316> as beloved <WG27> children; <WG5043>

and walk <WG4043> in love, <WG26> just <WG2531> as Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> you, and gave <WG3860> Himself <WG1438> up for us, an offering <WG4376> and a sacrifice <WG2378> to God <WG2316> as a fragrant <WG2175> aroma. <WG3744>
But do not let immorality <WG4202> or <WG2532> any <WG3956> impurity <WG167> or <WG2228> greed <WG4124> even <WG3366> be named <WG3687> among <WG1722> you, as is proper <WG4241> among saints; <WG40>

and [there must be no] filthiness <WG151> and silly <WG3473> talk, <WG3473> or <WG2228> coarse <WG2160> jesting, <WG2160> which <WG3739> are not fitting, <WG433> but rather <WG3123> giving <WG2169> of thanks. <WG2169>

For this <WG3778> you know <WG3609> with certainty, <WG1097> that no <WG3756> <WG3956> immoral <WG4205> or <WG2228> impure <WG169> person <WG169> or <WG2228> covetous <WG4123> man, <WG4123> who <WG3739> is an idolater, <WG1496> has <WG2192> an inheritance <WG2817> in the kingdom <WG932> of Christ <WG5547> and God. <WG2316>

Let no <WG3367> one <WG3367> deceive <WG538> you with empty <WG2756> words, <WG3056> for because <WG1223> of these <WG3778> things <WG3778> the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> comes <WG2064> upon the sons <WG5207> of disobedience. <WG543>
Therefore <WG3767> do not be partakers <WG4830> with them;
for you were formerly <WG4218> darkness, <WG4655> but now <WG3568> you are light <WG5457> in the Lord; <WG2962> walk <WG4043> as children <WG5043> of light <WG5457>
(for the fruit <WG2590> of the light <WG5457> [consists] in all <WG3956> goodness <WG19> and righteousness <WG1343> and truth <WG225>),
trying <WG1381> to learn <WG1381> what <WG5101> is pleasing <WG2101> to the Lord. <WG2962>
And do not participate <WG4790> in the unfruitful <WG175> deeds <WG2041> of darkness, <WG4655> but instead <WG3123> even <WG2532> expose <WG1651> them;
for it is disgraceful <WG150> even <WG2532> to speak <WG3004> of the things which are done <WG1096> by them in secret. <WG2931>

But all <WG3956> things <WG3956> become <WG5319> visible <WG5319> when they are exposed <WG1651> by the light, <WG5457> for everything <WG3956> that becomes <WG5319> visible <WG5319> is light. <WG5457>
For this <WG1352> reason <WG1352> it says, <WG3004> "Awake, <WG1453> sleeper, <WG2518> And arise <WG450> from the dead, <WG3498> And Christ <WG5547> will shine <WG2017> on you."
Therefore <WG3767> be careful <WG991> <WG199> how <WG4459> you walk, <WG4043> not as unwise <WG781> men, <WG781> but as wise, <WG4680>
making <WG1805> the most <WG1805> of your time, <WG2540> because <WG3754> the days <WG2250> are evil. <WG4190>
So <WG1223> <WG3778> then <WG1223> <WG3778> do not be foolish, <WG878> but understand <WG4920> what <WG5101> the will <WG2307> of the Lord <WG2962> is.
And do not get <WG3182> drunk <WG3182> with wine, <WG3631> for that is dissipation, <WG810> but be filled <WG4137> with the Spirit, <WG4151>

speaking <WG2980> to one <WG1438> another <WG1438> in psalms <WG5568> and hymns <WG5215> and spiritual <WG4152> songs, <WG5603> singing <WG103> and making <WG5567> melody <WG5567> with your heart <WG2588> to the Lord; <WG2962>

always <WG3842> giving <WG2168> thanks <WG2168> for all <WG3956> things <WG3956> in the name <WG3686> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> to God, <WG2316> even <WG2532> the Father; <WG3962>
and be subject <WG5293> to one <WG240> another <WG240> in the fear <WG5401> of Christ. <WG5547>
Wives, <WG1135> [be subject] to your own <WG2398> husbands, <WG435> as to the Lord. <WG2962>

For the husband <WG435> is the head <WG2776> of the wife, <WG1135> as Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> is the head <WG2776> of the church, <WG1577> He Himself <WG846> [being] the Savior <WG4990> of the body. <WG4983>
But as the church <WG1577> is subject <WG5293> to Christ, <WG5547> so <WG3779> also <WG2532> the wives <WG1135> [ought to be] to their husbands <WG435> in everything. <WG3956>
Husbands, <WG435> love <WG25> your wives, <WG1135> just <WG2531> as Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> the church <WG1577> and gave <WG3860> Himself <WG1438> up for her;
that He might sanctify <WG37> her, having cleansed <WG2511> her by the washing <WG3067> of water <WG5204> with the word, <WG4487>

that He might present <WG3936> to Himself <WG1438> the church <WG1577> in all <WG1741> her glory, <WG1741> having <WG2192> no <WG3361> spot <WG4696> or <WG2228> wrinkle <WG4512> or <WG2228> any <WG5100> such <WG5108> thing; <WG5108> but that she should be holy <WG40> and blameless. <WG299>

So <WG3779> husbands <WG435> ought <WG3784> also <WG2532> to love <WG25> their own <WG1438> wives <WG1135> as their own <WG1438> bodies. <WG4983> He who loves <WG25> his own <WG1438> wife <WG1135> loves <WG25> himself; <WG1438>

for no <WG3762> one <WG3762> ever <WG4218> hated <WG3404> his own <WG1438> flesh, <WG4561> but nourishes <WG1625> and cherishes <WG2282> it, just <WG2531> as Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> [does] the church, <WG1577>
because <WG3754> we are members <WG3196> of His body. <WG4983>

For this <WG3778> cause <WG473> a man <WG444> shall leave <WG2641> his father <WG3962> and mother, <WG3384> and shall cleave <WG4347> to his wife; <WG1135> and the two <WG1417> shall become <WG1510> <WG1519> one <WG1520> flesh. <WG4561>
This <WG3778> mystery <WG3466> is great; <WG3173> but I am speaking <WG3004> with reference <WG1519> to Christ <WG5547> and the church. <WG1577>

Nevertheless <WG4133> let each <WG1538> individual <WG1520> among you also <WG2532> love <WG25> his own <WG1438> wife <WG1135> even as himself; <WG1438> and [let] the wife <WG1135> [see to it] that she respect <WG5399> her husband. <WG435>
